default.description: Background color of base elements, like the app or popup menus

header.description: Background color for the header of base elements

hover.description: Background color of base elements, like popup menus, when they are hovered over

selected.description: Background color of base elements, like popup menus, when they are selected

default.description: Background color of surface elements, like panels or dialogs

header.description: Background color for the header of surface elements, including dialogs and table headers

hover.description: Background color of surface elements, like cards or table rows, when they are hovered over

selected.description: Background color of surface elements, like cards or table rows, when they are selected

default.description: Primary color used for the backgrounds of interactive elements

hover.description: Hover color used for the backgrounds of interactive elements

muted.description: Muted version of the primary color used for the background of interactive elements that don't need to be as strong as the primary color

primary.description: Primary color used for text within the application

secondary.description: Color used for text when less emphasis is needed

placeholder.description: Text color used for placeholder text in input and form fields

inverse.description: Color used for text on reversed backgrounds

default.description: Primary color used for interactive text elements

hover.description: Hover color used for interactive text elements

white.description: Text that is white across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes

black.description: Text that is black across all themes. Used for classification and status banners that do not change color in various themes

error.description: Text color used for form error messages

default.description: Primary color used for the border of interactive elements

hover.description: Hover color used for the border of interactive elements

muted.description: Muted version of the primary color used for the border of interactive elements that don't need to be as strong as the primary color

error.description: Border color used for form error borders

default.description: Color of a focused element's outline

critical.description: Color used to indicate items with a Critical status. Critical, form error, alert, emergency, urgent

serious.description: Color used to indicate items with a Serious status. Serious, warning, error, needs attention

caution.description: Color used to indicate items with a Caution status. Caution, unstable, unsatisfactory

normal.description: Color used to indicate items with a Normal status. Normal, on, ok, fine, go, satisfactory, success

standby.description: Color used to indicate items with a Standby status. Standby, available, enabled

off.description: Color used to indicate items with an Off status. Off, unavailable, disabled

topsecretsci.description: Color used to indicate the Top Secret//SCI classification

topsecret.description: Color used to indicate the Top Secret classification

secret.description: Color used to indicate the Secret classification

confidential.description: Color used to indicate the Confidential classification

cui.description: Color used to indicate the CUI classification

unclassified.description: Color used to indicate the Unclassified classification

disabled.description: Opacity used to indicate the disabled state

overlay.description: Drop shadow for overlays like Dialogs and overlay panels

default.description: Thickness of a focused element's outline
Space between a focused element's outline and edge
